title: Frank Martin: Der Cornet - Jard van Nes (1995)
description:
FRANK MARTIN (1890-1974)
Die Weise von Liebe und Tod des Cornets Christoph Rilke
fÃ¼r Alt und Kammerorchester (nach der Dichtung von Rainer Maria Rilke)
The Cornet â€¢ Le cornette

BBC Music Magazine:
"Tales of love amid stress and dislocation drew several superb wartime works from Martin, including a powerful version of the Tristram legend. For Rilke, he revisits the shadows of German Romanticism in a haunting feat of musical storytelling. The intense, generous vocal line threads patiently through shifting sound colours as Martin's uneasy consonances, never quite tonal, build to a fierce climax which thrillingly resolves in slow motion, like a film. Stunning singing, recorded in close-up." --Robert Maycock
